'''12w40b''' is the eleventh [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.4.2]], released on October 5, 2012<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/http://www.mojang.com/2012/10/minecraft-snapshot-12w40a</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in [[Java Edition 12w40a|12w40a]] and add a new [[commands]] feature.

== Additions ==
=== Command format ===
'''[[Commands#Tilde and Caret notation|Tilde notation]] '''
* Added tilde notation (<code>~</code>) to allow relative coordinates specification in commands.

== Fixes ==
'''3 bugs fixed'''
* Fixed a bug causing block breaking to carry over to the next block player starts to break.
* Fixed [[beacon]] beam rendering at short and tiny render distance.
* Fixed a crash related to [[map]]s in [[stronghold]]s.</onlyinclude>
